result.execSummary:
On one or more charges, the deferred prosecution or sentencing agreement(s) on this case were fulfilled, and the charge(s) were dismissed.

The defendant Alexis R Hufstedler was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess Amphetamine/LSD/Psilocin, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(d).
  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

miscConds.notes: $265.60 fine/cost on each Count (2 & 3), for a total of $531.20, to be paid to the Clerk of Court's Office - 60 days to pay or set up payment plan.  Failure to do so may result in warrant.
Eligible for expungement upon successful completion of Probation and the DJOC agreement.
Must complete an AODA assessment and comply with all recommendations.
